block.p: Jana Suzanne Weintraub, the director of marketing and merchandising in New York for the Bertelsmann Music Group, and David Michael Levin, the director of Internet marketing for the company, were married last evening in New York. Rabbi Joshua Caruso officiated at the Puck Building.

Mrs. Levin, 30, graduated from San Francisco State University. She is the daughter of Sandra Weintraub and Richard Weintraub, both of Los Angeles. Her father is the administrator of training for the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department. Her mother is a sales representative in Los Angeles for Omni Nutraceuticals, a maker of vitamins and nutritional supplements.

Jana Suzanne Weintraub, the director of marketing and merchandising in New York for the Bertelsmann Music Group, and David Michael Levin, the director of Internet marketing for the company, were married last evening in New York. Rabbi Joshua Caruso officiated at the Puck Building.

Mrs. Levin, 30, graduated from San Francisco State University. She is the daughter of Sandra Weintraub and Richard Weintraub, both of Los Angeles. Her father is the administrator of training for the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department. Her mother is a sales representative in Los Angeles for Omni Nutraceuticals, a maker of vitamins and nutritional supplements.

Mr. Levin, 29, graduated from Rutgers University, from which he also received an M.B.A. He is a son of Betsy and Richard Levin of Danbury, Conn. His father owns Entertainment Marketing Management, a company in Danbury that manages musical artists. The bridegroom's mother is a broker in the Danbury office of William Pitt Real Estate.
